Let’s Talk

Viking Film Fund is an initiative by Viking Sunset Studios aimed at supporting the Indonesian film industry on a global stage.

Empowering Visionary Filmmakers with World-Class Resources and Financial Backing

Viking Film Fund bridges the gap between creative vision and professional execution in Indonesian cinema. Our initiative combines essential financial backing with access to world-class production resources, ensuring local filmmakers can realize their stories at international standards. Through strategic funding and technical support, we remove the barriers that typically constrain ambitious film projects.

Beyond traditional funding, we provide complete access to Viking Sunset Studios' professional facilities and equipment. From ARRI camera systems to green-screen studios, filmmakers gain the tools needed for world-class production. This unique combination of financial and technical resources creates an environment where Indonesian storytellers can fully realize their creative ambitions.

Past Viking Film Fund Journey

[February 24, 2024]

Live Pitching

During the live pitching session, we are honored to have 5 esteemed jury members from the film industry. Their expertise ensures that the eventual winner truly stands out as the best among the best.

[February 24, 2024]

Award Ceremony & Winner Announcement

After carefully watching the 20 pitched films, our jury, along with Viking Sunset Studios President & CEO, Bo H. Holmgreen, have made the decision to crown the winner of VFF 2024. In the end, we have selected five film projects as the recipients of the Viking Film Fund 2024.
